short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plays YouTube Shorts in the normal YouTube player so you can rewind the the videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This free add-on for Google Chrome loads all videos from YouTube Shorts in the normal YouTube player for a better user experience.

The simple browser extension allows you to rewind videos and view the YouTube Shorts like they were normal YouTube videos. Give it a try!

To view a YouTube Short in the regular YouTube player, take the video ID and change the URL from a path like `/shorts/1234` to a path like `/watch?v=1234`. This extension does the URL redirect for you automatically so you don't have to think about it.
